mapper.sql: permissionId, parentId, name, permissionKey, permissionType, path, component, icon, sort, visible, status, createTime, updateTime
mapper.select: SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE status = '1' ORDER BY sort
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE permissionType = #{permissionType} AND status = '1' ORDER BY sort
SELECT FROM sys_permission WHERE parentId = #{parentId} AND status = '1' ORDER BY sort
SELECT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.permissionId = rp.permissionId WHERE rp.roleId = #{roleId} AND p.status = '1' ORDER BY p.sort

SELECT DISTINCT p.* FROM sys_permission p INNER JOIN sys_role_permission rp ON p.permissionId = rp.permissionId INNER JOIN sys_user u ON rp.roleId = u.roleId WHERE u.userId = #{userId} AND p.status = '1' ORDER BY p.sort
